Row.Text: Wilyham Wallas, [NEWLINE] Our antecessowris that we suld of reide,[NEWLINE] And hald in mynde thar nobille worthi deid,[NEWLINE] We lat ourslide throu verray sleuthfulnes,[NEWLINE] And castis us ever till uther besynes.[NEWLINE] Till honour ennymyis is our haile entent,[NEWLINE] It has beyne seyne in thir tymys bywent.[NEWLINE] Our ald ennemys cummyn of Saxonys blud,[NEWLINE] That nevyr yeit to Scotland wald do gud,[NEWLINE] But ever on fors and contrar haile thar will,[NEWLINE] Quhow gret kyndnes thar has beyne kyth thaim till.[NEWLINE] It is weyle knawyne on mony divers syde,[NEWLINE] How they haff wrocht in to thar mychty pryde,[NEWLINE] To hald Scotland at undyr evermar,[NEWLINE] Bot God abuff has maid thar mycht to par.[NEWLINE] Yhit we suld thynk one our bearis befor,[NEWLINE] Of that parablys as now I say no mor.[NEWLINE] We reide of ane rycht famous of renowne,[NEWLINE] Of worthi blude that ryngis in this regioune,[NEWLINE] And hensfurth I will my proces hald,[NEWLINE] Of Wilyham Wallas yhe haf hard beyne tald.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
Welcome to the domain of free men. Be warned that we will fight dearly for our lives if it comes to that.
A great king you are! Tell me, do your people hold liberty dearly to their hearts? Or do they forsake it?
What I feared has happened. An enemy of the worst kind has triumphed over us.
You may take our lands, but you may never take our freedom. We will return.
According to the Scotch Whisky Association there were 151 distilleries licensed to produce Scotch whisky as of May 2024.

William Wallace is one of Scotland's most revered heroes. He began as an outlaw, but became a leader of men, taking victory over the English at Stirling Bridge in 1297. He was not of noble blood, and perhaps this is why his memory is held so dear.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Sir William Wallace was a Scottish knight who became one of the main leaders during the First War of Scottish Independence. In August 1305, Wallace was captured in Robroyston, near Glasgow, and handed over to King Edward I of England, who had him hanged, drawn and quartered for high treason and crimes against English civilians.
Sir William Wallace (Scottish Gaelic: Uilleam Uallas, pronounced [ˈɯʎam ˈuəl̪ˠəs̪]; Norman French: William le Waleys.
Combat bonus with multiple adjacent enemy units
Combat bonus with multiple adjacent enemy units
Melee units receive a combat boost when there are two or more adjacent enemy units. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every two hill tiles adjacent to a city.
The Scottish Distillery adds a small increase to a city's [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

Distillation is a method of separating mixtures based on differences in volatility of components in a boiling liquid mixture. Distillation is a unit operation, or a physical separation process, and not a chemical reaction.
City must have a river nearby
